activities:
We collect data online in the form of survey responses provided by co-workers, bosses, direct reports, and other rater groups of any individual (participant) who is using our online assessment tools.  These responses and the survey respondents' email addresses are transferred to our web and database servers located in the United States. 
We create feedback reports based on the aggregated responses. Online PDF or web versions of the reports are made available to that participant and his or her career development coach and/or human resource manager and/or other pre-determined individual.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The Booth Company has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the U.S.-EU and U.S.-Swiss Safe Harbor Privacy Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by The Booth Company, please visit the BBB EUSAFE HARBOR web site at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
